name: NOT THE BEES! (timberworth, Beat_Beat_World, Kilansky, MysticDragon)
name_original: NOT THE BEES! (timberworth, Beat_Beat_World, Kilansky, MysticDragon)
description:
The bear  Bicolas Rage has stolen your hive's honey. In a fit of rage, you shall gather an army of bees to get your revenge against Bicolas Rage's pack of bears and take back your honey!

Left Click on the map to move

Press the space bar or the X button to gather more bees

Press the Shift button or the Z button to have your bees attack bears

Programming: Kilan "Sky" Larsen

Level Design and Cutscene Artist: Trevor Davis

Modeling, Texturings, Sounds:  Ashley Alison Bolanos

Animation, Modeling, UI art: Erik Jordan
